# Getting and Cleaning Data - Analyzing Wearable Computing Dataset - JHU 

## Analyzing Wearable Computing Dataset from the UCI repository.

The dataset represents data collected from the accelerometers from the Samsung Galaxy S smartphone.

## Packages Used 
1. data.table
2. reshape2

## Loading Rundown 

1. activityLabels - Stores activity labels provided with dataset in the activity_labels.txt.
2. features - Stores features provided with dataset in the features.txt.
3. train - Stores the train data from the train folder.
3. test - Stores the test data from the test folder.
4. combined - Merged both train and test.
